author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Department of Posts will conduct the regional-level Dak Adalat on March 28 at 11 a.m. at the office of the Postmaster General, Western Region, Coimbatore.

A press release from the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem East Division, Salem, said that the purpose of conducting Adalat was to redress the grievances of postal customers. Grievances on postal services must be sent to the Assistant Director (Staff), O/O, the PMG, Western Region, Coimbatore 641-002. The cover should be superscribed as ‘DAK Adalat case’.

The complaints should contain full details such as date and time of posting, full address of the sender and addressee, registered or consignment number with date and office of booking for money order, VP, Registered, Insured and speed post articles.

If the complaint is about savings bank of Postal Life Insurance, the complaint should contain the account numbers, PLI Policy numbers, name and address of the depositor or insurant, name of the post office, the details of recovery and any reference of the Postal Department wherever available.

Likewise, the divisional-level Dak Adalat will be held at 11 a.m. on March 31 at the office of the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, 3rd Floor, Salem HPO. Postal customers may send their complaints, if any, to reach the office before March 28, a release said.
title: Dak Adalat
